data.text: Palyamasile Lyuŵa lya Kupumulila, kuninkucha lyuŵa lyaandanda lya chijuma, che Maliamu jwa musi wa ku Magidala ni che Maliamu jwine ŵajawile kukulilola lilembe.
Chisisimuchile chakopochele chindendemesi chachikulungwa cha chilambo, katumetume jwa kwinani jwa Ambuje ŵatulwiche kutyochela kwinani, ŵaligalambwile liganga lila ni kutamila.
Uwoneche wakwe waliji mpela kumesya ni nguo syakwe syaliji syeswela mbee.
Ŵakulindilila lilembe lila ŵatetemele kwa lipamba nnope, ŵaliji mpela ŵawe.
Nambo katumetume jwa kwinani jula ŵaasalile achakongwe ŵala achitiji, “Ŵanyamwe nkajogopa! Ngumanyilila kuti nkunsosa Che Yesu juŵaŵambikwe pa nsalaba.
Nganapagwa pelepa pakuŵa ŵamale kusyuka mpela iŵasasile. Njise kunnole paŵagonile.
Nipele, njaule chitema nkaasalile ŵakulijiganya ŵao kuti asyuchile, nombewo akunnongolela ku Galilaya, kweleko chimwasimane. Ayaga, une jwammale kunsalila.”
Achiŵaga ni lipamba ni kusengwa kwakukulungwa, achakongwe wo ŵatyosile chitema ku lilembe, achiutukaga kukwasalila ŵakulijiganya ŵao.
Chisisimuchile, Che Yesu ŵasimene nawo, ŵatite “Ngunkomasya.” Achakongwe ŵala ŵajawile, ŵagakamwile makongolo gao ni kwapopelela.
Nipele Che Yesu ŵaasalile, “Nkajogopa! Njaule nkaasalile achalongo ŵangu ajaule ku Galilaya, kweleko ni kuchakamone une.”
Achakongwe ŵala pawajaulaga, ŵakulindilila ŵampepe ŵa lilembe ŵajawile mu mmusi kukwasalila achakulu ŵambopesi yanayose iyatendekwe.
Nipele, ŵasimene pamo ni achachekulu, ŵatemi nkungulu, pakumala kukunguluka ŵapele ŵakulindilila ŵala mbiya syasijinji,
ni kwasalila, “Ŵanyamwe chinjile yeleyi, ‘Ŵakulijiganya ŵao ŵaiche chilo, ŵachijiŵile chiilu uwe tuli tugonile.’
Iŵaga chaimanye yeleyi jwankulu jwa chilambo, uwe chitwanyenje, ni ŵanyamwe ngamma ni masausyo.”
Ŵakulindilila ŵala ŵasijigele mbiya sila, ŵatesile mpela iŵatite pakusalilwa. Jele ngani jo jajenele pasikati ja Ŵayahudi mpaka lelo jino.
Ŵakulijiganya kumi na moja ŵala ŵajawile ku Galilaya ku chitumbi kwaŵasalilwe ni Che Yesu ajaule.
Paŵamweni, ŵampopelele, nambo ŵampepe mwa ŵanyawo ŵaliji ni lipamba.
Nipele Che Yesu ŵaiche chiŵandi, ŵaasalile, “Mbegwile ukombole wose kwinani ni pachilambo.
Nipele njaule, nkaatende ŵandu ŵa ilambo yose aŵe ŵakulijiganya ŵangu, nchabatisyaga kwa liina lya Atati ni lya Mwana ni lya Mbumu jwa Akunnungu.
Nkaajiganye kugakamulichisya gose mpela ila indite pakunnajisya ŵanyamwe. None ndili pamo ni ŵanyamwe moŵa gose, elo, mpaka kumbesi kwa chilambo.”
